titles.title: National Care Corps Act of 2014
To establish a National Care Corps through which qualified volunteers provide care, companionship, and other services to seniors and individuals with disabilities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 7/30/2014--Introduced. National Care Corps Act of 2014 - Establishes in the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) the National Care Corps through which Corps Members provide certain services to individuals in need who are age 65 or older or have a disability and have difficulty with self-care.
